string-array.name: professions_desc
string-array.item: Modern browser UI technologies and frameworks (e.g. Angular, React, TypeScript, CSS preprocessors, etc.) is a strong advantage. Working in an Agile, iterative development environment
Work with outside data sources and RESTful API’s. Use latest development techniques: pair programming, TDD, p2p reviews, etc;
You’ll design and develop new and challenging tasks on a dynamic and tech-savvy team.
Experience in building applications using the python ecosystem (Django, Flask, Bottle, etc.)
Add new features to the drawing engine and improve existing features related to rendering of graphic primitives and other 2D graphics tasks;
